spiral.text: Remembering yesterday remembering last week, I realize...
Thinking about thinking about my thoughts reveals layers of understanding that...
This sadness echoes last year's sadness but differently because...
Reading this book again, I see what I missed before, which shows me what I'll miss this time until...
Spiraling back to where I started but...
Each return to this place deepens my understanding of previous returns...
